member.name: SolidBrush.GetColor
member.summary: The SolidBrush.GetColor method gets the color of this solid brush.
member.param: Pointer to a Color object that receives the color of this solid brush.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: SolidBrush.SetColor
member.summary: The SolidBrush.SetColor method sets the color of this solid brush.
member.param: Reference to a Color object that specifies the color to be set in this solid brush.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: SolidBrush.SolidBrush
member.summary: Creates a SolidBrush object based on a color.
member.param: Reference to a Color object that specifies the initial color of this solid brush.

member.name: SolidBrush.SolidBrush
member.param: The SolidBrush object to copy into this object.

member.name: SolidBrush.SolidBrush
member.summary: Creates a SolidBrush object based on a color.
member.param: Reference to a Color object that specifies the initial color of this solid brush.
